--[[ 힐받을 대상 선정. 일단 본인만 힐하도록. --]] function SearchToHeal( ThisNPC ) return ThisNPC end
--[[ 치유마법 시전 --]] function NPC_216:Heal( ThisNPC, Opponent ) local TALID_RENGOT_HEAL = 200021602 local Target = SearchToHeal( ThisNPC)
--ThisNPC:Narration( "Heal" ) ThisNPC:MoveToActor( Target, TALID_RENGOT_HEAL ) ThisNPC:UseTalent( TALID_RENGOT_HEAL, Target ) end
--[[ HOT형 재생 마법 시전 --]] function NPC_216:Regen( ThisNPC, Opponent ) local TALID_RENGOT_REGEN = 200021603 local BUFID_REGEN = 80041
if ThisNPC:CheckBuff( BUFID_REGEN ) then return end
local Target = SearchToHeal( ThisNPC )
--ThisNPC:Narration( "Regen" )
if Target ~= ThisNPC then ThisNPC:MoveToActor( Target, TALID_RENGOT_REGEN ) end
ThisNPC:UseTalent( TALID_RENGOT_REGEN, Target ) end
function NPC_216:OnYell( Requester, Target ) GLog( "NPC_216:OnYell\n" ) end
